metadata.name: Invocation of Active Directory Diagnostic Tool (ntdsutil.exe)
metadata.comment: Detects execution of ntdsutil.exe, which can be used for various attacks against the NTDS database (NTDS.DIT)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\ntdsutil.exe')))

output.summary: Detects execution of ntdsutil.exe, which can be used for various attacks against the NTDS database (NTDS.DIT)
